job.title: Junior Full Stack Web Developer
job.description: Picture this You learned front end development in order to create the aesthetically pleasing websites of your dreams You learned backend development to build these sites on your own and help empower people across the world to bring their companies dreams and ideas to life But youre stuck in a job where day after day youre working on the same site in the same industry for the same company Sound familiar If it does and youre looking for an exciting and innovative work experience then we may have the perfect job for youbrbrVictorious is seeking a Jr Full Stack Web Developer who can thrive in a company culture which values autonomy workethic and collaboration Were searching for an ambitious Jr Full Stack Web Developer to join our team Our SEO Strategy department has a substantial impact on the growth of Victorious and were committed to pushing current trends in web development in order to create a cuttingedge experience for our customer basebrbremWe are open to applicants across the United States as this is a remoteflex opportunityemstrongembrbremstrongstrongPrimary responsibility brbrstrongDesigning and implementing SEOfocused website solutions for customersbrbrstrongYoull also be responsible forbrstrongulliWriting welldesigned testable efficient code following web development best practicesliliCreating and modifying website templates and backend functionality for content management systemsliliQAing and deploying code to website environmentsliliServing as the primary technical point of contact for sales calls and customer meetingsliliMaintaining a comprehensive knowledge base of SEO development best practices and guidesliliInnovating to further systematize relevant customer deliverables while maximizing endvaluebrliulstrongRequired Skills amp ExperiencebrstrongulliHandson experience in writing crossbrowser compliant HTML amp CSSlili1  years of experience with the following technologiesliulliJavaScript  AJAX  jQueryliliPHP 5x and 7xliliHTML5liliCSS  SASSliliGITliliNPM  ComposerlilimySQL  phpMyAdminliulli1  years of experience with the following content management systemsliulliWordPressliliShopifyliulliSetup and maintenance of a LAMP serverliliComfortable building out responsive viewsliliExposure working with GIT in a collaborative team settingbrliulstrongThe GoodtoHavesbrstrongulliWell versed in search engine optimizationliliStrong knowledge of schema metadataliliRobust understanding of page load speed optimizationliliKnowledge with CMSs outside of WordPress and Shopify eg Squarespace and MagentoliliExperience building an entire application from both a front and back end perspectivebrliulstrongKey culture traits brstrongulliYou are selfmotivated You dont need to be tightly managed to be successful yet you understand the importance of following processes and communication You dont need to be fired up youre selfmotivated by the inner drive to produce the best results and to be part of creating something greatliliYou give a sht about your work You believe in the inherent value of work and your role in helping a team succeed You hate cynicism and are always looking to become a better version of yourself Ego isnt an issue for you because you know feedback is the fastest way to improveliliYou demonstrate radical integrity You take your responsibilities seriously even if theyre difficult or uncomfortable You do what you say youll do and youre always honest Coworkers can rely on you to deliver and management never worries about your work ethicbrliulstrongBenefits and PerksbrstrongulliRemote flexliliUnlimited PTOliliRobust SEO Training ProgramliliPaid Bank HolidaysliliTwo Week Paid Winter Holiday BreakliliAnnual Paid Company OffsiteliliQuarterly Team OutingsliliMatching Donations to Charitylili401k Company MatchliliCompany Sponsored Health  Dental  Vision  Life Insurance liliMonthly Stipend for WFH ExpensesliliEmployee Wellness ProgrambrliulstrongAbout UsbrbrstrongVictorious is the 26th fastestgrowing private company in California Located in the Design District of San Francisco were a hardworking group of professionals looking for longterm teammates to join our missionbrbrVictorious is not the typical San Francisco startup We are not funded by Silicon Valley venture capitalists Our days are not consumed with increasing runway or launching an MVP Were not hungry for acquisition and exit If not these then what are we Were a profitable efficient sustainable company scaling at a strong pace due to natural growth Our product is marketproven and is being sought out by some of the largest technology companies in San Francisco and beyond If youre looking for a place to call home without worrying about your employer shutting its doors for a myriad of reasons then we may be the place for youbrbrBenefits include medical dental vision 401k extended winter holiday break and more We offer the opportunity to be part of a successful fastgrowing company To learn more about us please visit our website at victoriousseocombrbrIf you are interested in applying for this opportunity please submit your resume All submissions will be evaluated and interviews will be conducted for those applicants who most strongly fit our needs To apply please send an uptodate resume and a cover letter explaining your interestbrbrNo phone calls please no agencies and no recruiters
